decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawing titles and/or documents:   Proposed Ground Floor Plan drawing no.1691/20/08 Rev D, Proposed First Floor Plan drawing 1691/20/09 Rev D, Proposed Second Floor Plan drawing 1691/20/10 Rev C, Proposed Roof Plan drawing 1691/20/11 Rev C, Proposed Front Elevation Plan drawing 1691/20/17 Rev C, Proposed Rear Elevation Plan drawing 1691/20/18 Rev A, Proposed North Side Elevation Plan drawing 1691/20/19 Rev C, Proposed South Side Elevation Plan drawing 1691/20/20 Rev A, Proposed Section AA Plan drawing 1691/20/21 Rev A and Outbuilding Existing and Proposed Floor Plans and Elevations drawing 1691/20/22A
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials shall be in accordance with the materials described in the Application Form and the Approved Plans as listed in Condition 2 of this decision.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, policies 1.1 (g) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012), policy D1 of the London Plan 2021 and National Planning Policy Framework 2019 - Section 12 Achieving well-designed places.

| The proposed flank, first floor window and side dormer (north side elevation), facing no.74 Perryn Road shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level and remain in perpetuity.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D1, D2 and D4 of the London Plan 2021. policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
description: Side dormer roof extension and installation of first floor flank window.
